GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Check if modulo is 0 before dividing.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 96725758eff7b3805e4e94d1443a100757412720. For more details please see the references link.
